inputs.name: E2E_QA_PAIRS
inputs.description: Held-out test set of 55 manually-curated Q&A pairs stratified by query type (simple, relationship, aggregation, extraction, glossary, out-of-scope). Based on real FORCE 2020 Norwegian North Sea well data (118 wells, 26 mnemonics). Never used during development - true unbiased test set.

schema.query_type: enum (simple, relationship, aggregation, extraction, glossary, out_of_scope)

inputs.name: FORCE_2020_WELLS
inputs.description: FORCE 2020 Norwegian North Sea well log dataset. Wells with attributes: UWI, WELL, FIELD, OPERATOR, COUNTRY, STATE, COUNTY, BASIN. Used by E2E tests via real AstraDB vector search.
inputs.note: Live data in AstraDB, accessed via real API calls (no mocks). Test queries reference specific wells: 15/9-13 (Sleipner East Appr), 16/1-2 (Ivar Aasen Appr), 15/9-15 (Gungne).

inputs.name: FORCE_2020_CURVES
inputs.description: LAS curve data from FORCE 2020 wells. 26 unique mnemonics: GR, NPHI, RHOB, DTC, CALI, DRHO, PEF, RMED, RXO, RDEP, RSHA, SP, BS, DCAL, DTS, MUDWEIGHT, ROP, etc. Used by E2E tests for relationship queries (well â†’ curves).
inputs.note: Live data accessed via real Graph Traverser (in-memory graph with precomputed indices). No mocks.

inputs.name: GRAPH_STRUCTURE
inputs.sha256: N/A (not validated in this task, dependency of graph_traverser)
inputs.description: Combined graph structure with nodes (wells + curves + sites + measurements) and edges (describes, reports_on). Used by real Graph Traverser for relationship queries. Precomputed indices: well_to_curves, curve_to_well, well_mnemonics.
inputs.note: Loaded once on graph traverser initialization (singleton pattern). ~5-10MB in memory.

inputs.name: GLOSSARY_CACHE
inputs.sha256: N/A (dynamic cache, changes with scraper usage)
inputs.description: Glossary term definitions scraped from SLB/SPE/AAPG. Cache used by MCP glossary server. Terms: porosity, permeability, gamma ray, lithofacies, reservoir, wellbore, etc. Real scraper used in E2E tests (no mocks).
inputs.note: Cache may be cold (no definitions) or warm (cached from previous runs). Test accepts both glossary-enriched answers AND honest 'no definition' responses.

inputs.name: LLM_GENERATION
inputs.description: Real LLM generation used for reasoning step in E2E tests. Model: watsonx.ai (or equivalent). Decoding: greedy (deterministic). Max tokens: 1500 (default), 500 (aggregation). All 19 E2E tests use real LLM calls (no mocks per user requirement).
inputs.note: API key required (WATSONX_API_KEY in .env). No mocks, no fake responses - all tests validate real LLM integration.
